title: Fool (Egyptian broad beans)
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin broad beans', '2 tablespoons olive or vegetable oil', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '1 onion or 2 shallots, minced', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1/4 cucumber, diced', '1/2 green pepper, diced', '1 tomato, diced', 'minced fresh parsley', 'salt to taste', 'ground cumin to taste']
